import { useState } from "react"; const BoardMembersComponent = props => { const [names, setNames] = useState(props.directorList); const handleChangeDirectors = (id, event) => { const { name, value} = event.target; const values = [...names]; values[id][name] = value; setNames(values); }; const addName = () => { setNames([...names, {name: ""}]); }; return (
{ names.map((x, id)=>{ return
handleChangeDirectors(e, id)} type="text" className="form-control margin-bottom" id="company" /> x
}) }
x
); }; export default BoardMembersComponent;
